name: Bionic Toolset
description: Implanted in your hands and fingers is a complete tool set - screwdriver, hammer, wrench, drill, chisel and hacksaw.  You can use this in place of many tools when crafting.

name: Bionic Rescue Tool
description: A bionic system designed for firefighters and rescue workers, this implant fills the function of many heavy tools such as saw, crowbar, axe and car jack.
